data.title: Public Course - Host an Outing
data.meta_description: Dodge Riverside Golf Club is found along the Missouri River and provides outstanding views of the Omaha Metro. Located just minutes from downtown Omaha.
data.text:
Golf Outings & Charity Events are our specialty!

At Dodge Riverside Golf Club, we pride ourselves on specializing in Golf Outings and Charity Events. Our experienced team ensures every event, from intimate gatherings to large-scale corporate or charity tournaments, leaves a lasting impression on participants. By choosing Dodge Riverside, your event is guaranteed to stand out, thanks to our meticulous planning and coordination that allows hosts to enjoy the event as much as their guests.

Ideal Location for Memorable Golf Outings

Our golf club's prime location, just minutes from downtown Omaha and near local hotels, makes Dodge Riverside an accessible and convenient choice for all attendees. This strategic location, combined with our picturesque, tree-lined fairways, makes us a top pick for anyone looking to host a golf outing that combines convenience with natural beauty.

Experience Traditional Golf at Its Best

Dodge Riverside offers a traditional golfing experience with challenges for seasoned players and accessible play for beginners. Our course is designed to be inclusive, ensuring an enjoyable experience for golfers of all skill levels, without the intimidation of forced carries into fairways or greens.

Exceptional Food & Beverage Services

Beyond the greens, Dodge Riverside excels in catering to your event's culinary needs with the Riverside Grille. Whether opting for our pre-packaged meal options or customizing a menu with our Food & Beverage Coordinator, Mikala, we're here to ensure your event's dining experience matches the high quality of our golfing facilities.

Comprehensive Event Management

Our motto, “Give us your player list and we will take care of the rest,” reflects our commitment to comprehensive event management. From customized cart signs and scorecards to professional scoring at no extra charge, our staff is dedicated to handling every detail, allowing you to focus on your guests.

Partnering with Local Charity Events

Dodge Riverside is not just a venue but a community partner, actively collaborating with local charity events throughout the summer. If you're looking to have Dodge Riverside as a partner for your event, please reach out through our contact form.
